extension.description: This module shows Easy Search component as module. Please refer http://www.openjs.com/scripts/events/keyboard_shortcuts/ about how to set the parameter "Shortcut Key" because this module uses the javascript. If you also want to know which code it is used for a specific key to set the parameter "Key Code", you can use http://www.ryancooper.com/resources/keycode.asp

field.name: mode
field.label: Display Mode
field.description: If you would not like this to be displayed, choose Modal Window. If you choose Modal Window the parameter style will be ignored.

field.name: shortcut
field.label: Shortcut
field.description: Wether to use shortcut key. This future does not work if the focus is in input area.

field.name: keycode
field.label: Key Code
field.description: Key code for focusing the input box. For example, 70 is F.
